action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the book on the table, the plate on the table and the mop on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. The wardrobe is empty.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a counter and a cupboard. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway, a pantry and a living room here.

> take plate 

(I assume I can take the plate, and I will try to put it on the table later)
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a table, a shelf, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book and a plate.
You put the book on the table.
You put the plate on the table.

> go to broom closet 

(I need to find a mop)
You can't go to a broom closet from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway, a pantry and a living room here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a mop.

> go to living room 

(I have a book, a plate and a mop. I will put the mop on the table)
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to kitchen 

(I will try to go to living room from there)
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to hallway 

(I will try to find another way)
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.

> go to bedroom 

(I think I can get to the living room or table from there)
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.

> go to living room 

(I've been here before, I think I can put the mop on the table now)
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to bedroom 

(I think I can get to the living room from there)
You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a wardrobe and a bed. The pillow is on the bed. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.

> go to hallway 

(I will try another way)
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a kitchen, a broom closet and a bedroom here.

> go to living room 

(I will try again, hopefully I can get there this time)
You can't go to a living room from here.

> go to kitchen 

(I'll try to get to living room from there)
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a hallway, a pantry and a living room here.

You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a table, a shelf, a plate, a book, a couch and a chair. The plate is on the table. The book is on the table. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the mop on the table.
Model produced DONE action at turn 29, end episode.
